summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 8828, entitled: "An ordinance granting permission to Arcade Electric Company to connect the Whitcomb Building, the Entabrook Building, the Curtis Building and the Lumber Exchange Building, in the City of Seattle with the steam heating plant located in the Arcade Building, situated on the east half of block 1, of A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle " approved November 11, 1902.
